title: Help identifying geometric sans serif
content:
Hi,

I need help identifying the geometric sans serif seen on this picture:

[http://www.bureaucollective.ch/img/projects/34/elements/Bureau-Collectiv...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819041517/http:/www.bureaucollective.ch/img/projects/34/elements/Bureau-Collective-Visuelle-Dialoge-05.jpg "http://www.bureaucollective.ch/img/projects/34/elements/Bureau-Collective-Visuelle-Dialoge-05.jpg")

More pictures here: http://www.bureaucollective.ch/#!/project/34/0

Thanks in advance
author: G.O.G.

comments.content: [Walsheim](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819041517/http:/www.grillitype.com/typefaces/walsheim) by Noël Leu of Grilli Type
